# bart-cnn-pubmed-arxiv-v3-e16

This model is a fine-tuned version of [theojolliffe/bart-cnn-pubmed-arxiv](https://huggingface.co/theojolliffe/bart-cnn-pubmed-arxiv) on an unknown dataset.
